main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Napavine, Washington, on June 1, 1952, where the witness described the object as glowing and resembling a piece of glass.
interesting points: The object was observed glowing brightly in front of the witness's car., The sighting was classified as a ground visual observation., The direction of the object was from east to west., The document is part of Project Blue Book, which documents UFO sightings., There were no confirmed photographs taken of the sighting.
sighted object: a glowing object resembling a piece of glass
witness description: a civilian who observed the object while driving
